title: LedgeMan
description: Every day, the same oversensitive man takes something the wrong way, climbs out on a window ledge, and threatens to jump. And every day, his mother appears at the window and tells him to remember all the reasons for living.
quote: In spite of what you think. you have never been a disappointment to me.
altHero: man outside a building, gripping the brick wall; a woman pokes her head out a nearby window
alt1: man against the brick of the building looking down
alt3: man looks into the window to speak to the woman
